primary_changes: Added context-aware error handling functions for message parsing, agent discovery, and chat failures
Introduced createMissingMessageError(), createAgentNotFoundError(), and createChatError() helper functions

patterns_discovered: Detailed error handling with context and suggestions
Structured error creation using werrors package
Categorization of error scenarios with specific error types
Adding helpful context and actionable suggestions to errors
gotchas_discovered: Different potential failure modes in agent communication
Need for providing clear, actionable error messages
Various error scenarios: connection, timeout, authentication, rate limiting, model configuration

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Update handleMessage() errors with context-aware suggestions

recommendations: Continue enhancing error messages with contextual information
Add logging for structured errors to aid debugging
Consider internationalizing error messages for broader accessibility
Implement comprehensive error handling across other components
